title: Fix the double movement of position on manual edits
description: Fix the double movement of position on manual edits

title: Revert "Revert "fix: update center as per the last position""
description: Revert a previous revert of the fix to update the center of a schematic component as per the last position.

title: Revert "fix: update center as per the last position"
description: Reverts a previous commit that fixed a bug in the schematic viewer.

title: fix: update center as per the last position
description: Update the center position of a schematic component based on the last drag event

title: Fixed press interaction on mobile
description: Fixed press interaction on mobile devices

title: Patch Mouse Pan Broken (use-mouse-matrix@1.3.2 regression)
description: Patch a regression in the `use-mouse-matrix` library, which broke the mouse pan functionality.

title: update use mouse matrix transform for mobile gesture support
description: Update the version of the "use-mouse-matrix-transform" dependency to 1.3.3.

title: add editCount to circuitJsonKey
description: Adding the `editCount` property to the `circuitJsonKey` to uniquely identify the circuit.

title: Refactored pcb error to warning
description: Refactored the `pcb_manual_edit_conflict_error` to `pcb_manual_edit_conflict_warning`.

title: Some checks for API design standards
description: Adds safety checks to ensure that every `AnyCircuitElement` has a type and an `id` property with the key name `{type}_id`.

title: Exported schematic warning from any_circuit_element
description: Exported the `schematic_manual_edit_conflict_warning` property from `any_circuit_element`.

title: Defined error obj for sch manual edits conflict
description: Defines an error object for handling conflicts between manual edits and explicit schX/schY coordinates in a schematic.

title: added pcb_board material
description: Added a new `material` field to the `PcbBoard` type, allowing users to specify the material of the PCB board as either "fr4" or "fr1".

title: Count Edits to enable smarter keying downstream
description: Adds support for editCount on cju objects to enable smarter keying downstream

title: added material prop with fr4 as a default and fr1 as an option
description: Added a new `material` prop to the `board` component with `fr4` as the default and `fr1` as an optional value.

title: silkscreen text bottom layer support & Pcb like behavior
description: Adds support for silkscreen text on the bottom layer and updates the text positioning and rotation behavior to match PCB-like behavior.

title: feat fr1 & fr4 material variance
description: Adds support for different board materials (FR1 and FR4) with corresponding color customization.

title: Fix Board Centering, Major Performance Improvements, Incrementally Load Board, Fix Janky Trace Drawings, Fix Tooltip Slowdown
description: Introduces major performance improvements, fixes for board centering, trace drawings, and tooltip slowdown.

title: repro Schematic Trace crossing "hop" generated incorrectly
description: Fixes a bug where the schematic trace crossing "hop" is generated incorrectly.

title: Emitted warnings for pcb and sch
description: Emits warnings for both schematic and PCB when there are manual placement conflicts with prop-defined coordinates.

title: updating checks to fix Invalid DRC Errors
description: Updating the versions of `@tscircuit/checks` and `@tscircuit/math-utils` dependencies to fix Invalid DRC Errors.

title: add css-select as prod dep
description: Add css-select as a production dependency

title: optimize selector cache prior to SourceTraceRender (2x speedup on benchmark)
description: Optimize selector cache prior to SourceTraceRender, resulting in a 2x speedup on the benchmark.

title: Use css-select for faster selectOne and selectAll queries, cache selectOne and selectAll queries (~4-8x speedup on overall render times)
description: Use css-select for faster selectOne and selectAll queries, and cache the results to improve overall render times.

title: feat: board material
description: Adds a new "material" property to the Board component

title: Update to @tscircuit/circuit-json-util to get the editCount property
description: The pull request updates the `@tscircuit/circuit-json-util` package to remove the dependency on `@tscircuit/soup-util`.

title: update checks and circuit json to connectivity net, speculative fix for spurious DRC errors
description: Update checks and circuit JSON to connectivity net, a speculative fix for spurious DRC errors

title: add colors to text in impact column
description: Add colors to the "Impact" column in the PR table

title: patch: not able to fetch pr impact gracefully
description: Patch to handle cases where the PR impact cannot be determined gracefully.

title: refactor(pr-analysis): replace PRsByRepository with PrsTable and add PR analysis data handling
description: Refactors the PR analysis feature by introducing a new `PrsTable` component to replace the deprecated `PRsByRepository` component, and adds support for fetching and processing PR analysis data, including grouping PRs by repository and contributor.

title: solving logic error causing false overlaps errors
description: Fixes a logic error causing false overlaps errors in the PCB trace non-overlapping check.

title: Fix unsupported shape "rotated_rect"
description: Fix unsupported shape "rotated_rect" in the Gerber file generation.

title: add midpoint method
description: Adds a function to calculate the midpoint between two points.

title: introduce pointToBoxDistance and pointToBoundsDistance
description: The pull request introduces two new functions, `pointToBoxDistance` and `pointToBoundsDistance`, that calculate the minimum distance from a point to a box or a bounds rectangle, respectively.

title: refactor(CodeAndPreview): add pkgFilesWithContent to returned object
description: This change enhances the returned object by including all files from `pkgFilesWithContent`, improving the completeness of the data structure used in the component.

title: fake endpoint to get the completed order_quote & add env variable `TSCIRCUIT_REGISTRY_API_BASE_URL` for order button
description: Adds a fake endpoint to get the completed order_quote and adds an environment variable `TSCIRCUIT_REGISTRY_API_BASE_URL` for the order button.

title: refactor(CodeEditor): support tscircuit.config.json && extract file selection logic into utility function
description: Refactor the CodeEditor component to move the logic for finding the target file into a separate utility function, and add support for the `tscircuit.config.json` file.

title: chore: runframe update
description: Update the version of `@tscircuit/runframe` dependency

title: Removed Insert > Chip from editor page and removed footprint dialog
description: Removed the "Insert > Chip" feature from the code editor and the footprint dialog.

title: add filter to user profile
description: Add a filter to the user profile page to sort snippets by various criteria (most recent, least recent, most starred, A-Z, Z-A).

title: refactor(CodeEditorHeader): add support for several file types formatting
description: Refactor the CodeEditorHeader component to add support for formatting Markdown and HTML files, improve file type detection, and handle errors for unsupported file types.

title: Restricted edit package name button to owner only
description: Restricts the edit package name button to only the package owner.

title: feat: enhance UI and error handling in package editor
description: Enhance UI and error handling in package editor

title: Added file selector to /p/editor
description: Added a file selector to the /p/editor page.

title: refactor(CodeEditor): simplify file selection logic in useEffect
description: Refactor the file selection logic in the `useEffect` hook to improve readability and maintainability.

title: fix(tree-view): correct syntax error in selectedTreeVariants and sync selected item
description: Fix syntax error in `selectedTreeVariants` and refactor `transformFilesToTreeData` to handle hidden files and use an array structure for tree data.

title: patch: icon color update
description: Update the icon color in the FileSidebar and CodeEditorHeader components.

title: fix(use-fork-package-mutation): handle error when forking own package
description: Fixes an error that occurs when trying to fork one's own package.

title: Change Editor Page endpoints from `/snippets/*` to `/packages/*`, introduce file tree, multi-file selection in editor
description: Change Editor Page endpoints from `/snippets/*` to `/packages/*`, introduce file tree, multi-file selection in editor

title: update circuit json to gerber to fix issues with rotated rect
description: Update the `circuit-json-to-gerber` dependency to fix issues with rotated rectangles.

title: rename to `order_quotes`
description: Rename the "order_quote" directory to "order_quotes"

title: style(components): improve responsiveness and styling in package header and code viewer
description: Improve responsiveness and styling of the package header and code viewer components

title: fake endpoint for `order_quotes`
description: The pull request adds a fake endpoint for `order_quotes` that allows creating, retrieving, and creating all vendor quotes for a package release.

title: fix: image preview
description: Fix the image preview in the package page.

title: chore: update @tscircuit/core to v0.0.379
description: Update @tscircuit/core to v0.0.379

title: runTscircuitModule supports passing props and named exports
description: The pull request adds support for passing props to the main component of a module and support for modules with named exports in the `runTscircuitModule` function.

title: runTscircuitModule
description: Adds a new function `runTscircuitModule` to quickly run a published tscircuit module by its name.

title: chore: update @tscircuit/core to v0.0.378
description: Update @tscircuit/core to v0.0.378

title: chore: update @tscircuit/core to v0.0.377
description: Update @tscircuit/core to v0.0.377

title: chore: update @tscircuit/core to v0.0.372
description: Automated update of @tscircuit/core to v0.0.372.

title: fix the endpoint base url for `tscircuit.com` in local as well as prod
description: Fix the endpoint base URL for `tscircuit.com` in local as well as production environments.

title: update schematic-viewer without the snapping
description: Update the schematic-viewer without the snapping feature.

title: Order dialog in Runframe (Part -1)
description: Adds a new feature to the Runframe component to display an order dialog.

title: fix snapping movement back to origin on manual edit
description: Fix snapping movement back to origin on manual edit

title: fix import errors not throwing, import easyeda
description: Fix import errors not throwing and update easyeda dependency to version 0.0.134

title: feat(RunFrameWithApi): dynamically set document title based on package.json or entrypoint
description: Dynamically set the document title based on the package.json name or the guessed entrypoint from the file system map.

title: fix(auth): check session before logging out
description: Ensure the user is logged in before attempting to clear the session to provide a more user-friendly message when the user is already logged out.

title: Update file server so that API requests work (fixes jlcpcb import not working)
description: Update the `@tscircuit/file-server` dependency to version `0.0.19` to fix the issue with the JLCPCB import functionality.

title: feat(cli): add upgrade command to check for CLI updates
description: Introduces a new "upgrade" command to the CLI that allows users to check for the latest version of the CLI and display a message if the user is already on the latest version.

title: ref: rename snippet type to package type
description: Rename "snippet type" to "package type" in the UI

title: chore: update dependencies to latest versions
description: Update dependencies to the latest versions

title: Fixed bad Instructions after clone
description: Fixed the instructions displayed after cloning a project.

title: feat(cli): add directory confirmation prompt for init command
description: Add a confirmation prompt to the `tsci init` command when no directory is provided.

title: ci: update GitHub Actions to use latest versions of actions/checkout and setup-bun
description: Update GitHub Actions to use latest versions of actions/checkout and setup-bun

title: docs: enhance tsci-push documentation with image-captions
description: Added image captions to enhance the documentation for the `tsci push` command.

title: docs: update quickstart-cli documentation and add images for tsci push
description: Adds documentation and images for the `tsci push` command in the quickstart-cli documentation.

title: add iframe with keyboard
description: Add an iframe with keyboard example code to the "build-a-custom-keyboard-with-tscircuit" tutorial

title: Introduce LED Matrix 4 Example, Introduce MultiSectionPathingSolver, Rewrite TwoTraceCrossing Solver, Run Simplification Twice, Straw Penalty
description: Introduce LED Matrix 4 Example, Introduce MultiSectionPathingSolver, Rewrite TwoTraceCrossing Solver, Run Simplification Twice, Straw Penalty
